description:
AJKK-13 EMBROIDERED NET 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Net Trouser: Lawn silk Dupatta: Net Color: Red

Own your power in this striking Indian red ensemble. It's a statement piece that exudes sophisticated fierceness. The intricate embroidery shimmers like a desert sunset—antique gold zari and red-rust threads entwine with glorious finesse, studded with 5mm cupped gold sequins that gleam like scattered jewels. The 16 kalis, meticulously embellished with stunning paisley motifs, unfurl like the petals of a red poppy dusted with desert gold. Paired with a magnificently embroidered dupatta, this isn't just an outfit—it's a symphony of power and celebration.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front neckline on net
16 embroidered kalis on net
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on net
4 meter embroidered ghera border on net
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on net with 2 side borders
1.5 meter wide width lawn silk for trouser
